name: Holiday Inn Express Paris-Canal de la Villette

reviews.text: This hotel is a gem. Nice quite location, away from main roads. The hotel is modern, clean and has terrific staff.
reviews.title: Fantastic, comfortable hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Paris was very warm and humid when I visited. However, the hotel air conditioning allowed a good nights sleep. I was on the 6th floor where the rooms have balconies, and it was nice to sit out and relax in the morning with my coffee.
reviews.title: Class hotel in premier location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room has a large Queen Size bed and a bed settee, and it is large enough for a family. The Bathroom was clean with a shower, and a clever use of doors allows someone to use the toilet in private, whilst someone showers in private. The Hotel room also had a large LCD TV with plenty of cable channels, some of which were in English.
reviews.title: A real Gem - I nearly decided to keep it to myself ;-)

reviews.text: Breakfast was good. A huge choice with an all you can eat buffet including hot meats, eggs etc. The Coffee was very nice.
reviews.title: Mixed Feelings about this Hotel

reviews.text: I traveled to Paris without a car, and the hotel is 2-3 minute walk to Riquet metro station where you can travel directly to Gare Del'Est, Opera and the Lourve. If you are traveling by car, the hotel has plenty of parking.
reviews.title: Clean and modern addition to 18e - but hopeless service

aka: Holiday Inn Express Paris-Canal De La Villette Hotel
description: The Holiday Inn Express Paris Canal de la Villette is a brand new 3 star hotel, eco-friendly and totally non-smoking, perfect for your business and leisure needs.Easily accessible, the Holiday Inn Express Paris Canal de la Villette hotel is located 20km from Roissy-CDG and Orly airports, 2km from Gare de l Est and Nord (Eurostar and Thalys) train stations and a few steps from Crimee and Laumiere metro stations. The hotel also has a prime location for the CitÃ© des Sciences et de l Industrie , the Buttes Chaumont , the Zenith Music Hall, the Expostion Centres Villepinte and Bourget The hotel s modern design, surprising cladding of wood, and the hanging garden with 2 terraces facing the water, offers you a quiet green area in the city centre of Paris. Of course: the AC, the High Speed Internet, the WIFI, the Business Centre, the private Parking The Express by Holiday Inn Paris Canal de la Villette hotel can accommodate you in 144 rooms, all equipped with Flat Screen TVs, some inter-connecting, and some with a balcony offering you exceptional views. The restaurant and the bar will cater to all your needs.130 persons can convene in our6 meeting rooms, with a dividable space of 175m of natural light. Every meeting room has access to WIFI, High Speed Internet and a Video-projector.
